vo-dml:model.name: caom2
vo-dml:model.description: a general purpose data model for use as the core data model of an astronomical data centre
vo-dml:model.title: Common Archive Observation Model
vo-dml:model.author: Patrick Dowler, Canadian Astronomy Data Centre

primitiveType.name: uuid
primitiveType.description: represents a 128-bit binary ID in the canonical ascii UUID format

enumeration.name: ObservationIntentType
enumeration.description: the intent of the original creator (usually observer) in acquiring this observation

literal.name: science
literal.description: the intent of this observation was to create science data

literal.name: calibration
literal.description: the intent of this observation was to create calibration data

literal.name: outreach
literal.description: the intent of this observation was to create public outreach content

enumeration.name: CalibrationLevel

literal.name: PLANNED
literal.description: (-1) planned data product that does not yet exist

literal.name: RAW_INSTRUMENTAL
literal.description: (0) raw data in some opaque instrument-specific format

literal.name: RAW_STANDARD
literal.description: (1) raw data in a common format

literal.name: CALIBRATED
literal.description: (2) standard calibration steps have been applied

literal.name: PRODUCT
literal.description: (3) additional non-standard calibration steps have been applied

enumeration.name: EnergyBand
enumeration.description: a general set of energy regions that span the electromagnetic spectrum; work-around: using the name of the literal to convey the serialised value

enumeration.name: ReleaseType
enumeration.description: a flag indicating how an artifact is classified to determine access permissions; work-around: using the name of the literal to convey the serialised value

literal.name: data
literal.description: access permission checks assume the protected item is data

literal.name: meta
literal.description: access permission checks assume the protected item is metadata

enumeration.name: PolarizationState
enumeration.description: a classification of polarization (Stokes states plus other related quantities); work-around: using the name of the literal to convey the serialised value

literal.name: EPOLI
literal.description: elliptical polarization intensity: sqrt(Q^2 + U^2 + V^2)

dataType.name: VocabularyTerm
dataType.description: base class of a single term (word) in a vocabulary (NEW in CAOM-2.3)

attribute.name: namespace
attribute.description: globally unique namespace for the vocabulary

attribute.name: term
attribute.description: the word from the vocabulary

attribute.name: base
attribute.description: flag indicating of the vocabulary namespace is a base vocabulary

dataType.name: CalibrationStatus
dataType.description: term from the IVOA calibration-status vocabulary; this vocabulary does not yet exist but can be created using optional terms in the ObsCore standard (NEW in CAOM-2.5)

dataType.name: DataProductType
dataType.description: term from the IVOA product-type vocabulary (CHANGED from CAOM DataProductType vocabulary based on ObsCore in CAOM-2.5)

dataType.name: Quality
dataType.description: vocabulary term used in CAOM; this class defines constants for the CAOM Quality vocabulary (CHANGED from enumeration in CAOM-2.4)

dataType.name: Status
dataType.description: vocabulary term used in CAOM; this class defines constants for the CAOM Status vocabulary (CHANGED from enumeration in CAOM-2.4)

dataType.name: TargetType
dataType.description: vocabulary term used in CAOM; this class defines constants for the CAOM TargetType vocabulary (CHANGED from enumeration in CAOM-2.4)

dataType.name: DataLinkSemantics
dataType.description: term from the DataLink Core vocabulary (CHANGED from ProductType enumeration in CAOM-2.5)

dataType.name: Tracking
dataType.description: term from the Tracking vocabulary NEW from enumeration in CAOM-2.5)

dataType.name: UCDTerm
dataType.description: term from the UCD1+ vocabulary (NEW from enumeration in CAOM-2.5)

objectType.name: Entity
objectType.description: base entity class to support persistence; entity attributes are generally set or updated by persistence implementations

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: globally unique identifier (primary key)

attribute.name: lastModified
attribute.description: timestamp of last modification of this entity; the timestamp is intended to be applied or updated when the entity is stored (e.g. in a database)

attribute.name: metaChecksum
attribute.description:
checksum of this entity; (NEW in CAOM-2.3)
The URI must conform to the pattern {algorithm}:{value}, for example: md5:4be91751541fd804e7207663a0822f56. The checksum of an entity is computed by accumulating byte representation of individual metadata values in the following order: (1) CaomEntity.id for entities, (2) CaomEntity.metaProducer, (3) state fields in alphabetic order (foo.a comes before foo.b) and using depth-first recursion (foo.abc.x comes before foo.def). Null values are ignored so that the addition of new fields in future versions will not change/invalidate existing checksums until values are assigned. Non-null values are converted to bytes as follows.
TODO: add digestFieldNames to algorithm
string: UTF-8 encoded bytes URI: UTF-8 encoded bytes of string representation float: IEEE754 single (4 bytes) double: IEEE754 double (8 bytes) boolean: convert to single byte, false=0, true=1 (1 bytes) byte: as-is (1 byte) short: (2 bytes, network byte order == big endian)) integer: (4 bytes, network byte order == big endian) long: (8 bytes, network byte order == big endian) date: truncate time to whole number of seconds and treat as a long (seconds since 1970-01-01 00:00:00 UTC)

attribute.name: metaProducer
attribute.description:
identifier for the producer of this entity and child entities with null metaProducer; (NEW in CAOM-2.4)
The URI should conform to the pattern {organisation}:{software name-version} (for example: cadc:cfht2caom2-1.1) and identifies the tools used to produce the metadata. This information is intended for use by operators to help diagnose metadata issues.

objectType.name: CaomEntity
objectType.description: base CAOM entity class to support accumulated metadata checkcums and lastModified timestamps to support synchronisation

attribute.name: maxLastModified
accMetaChecksum
attribute.description:
accumulated checksum of the metadata of this entity and all child entities; (NEW in CAOM-2.3)
The URI must conform to the pattern {algorithm}:{value}, for example: md5:4be91751541fd804e7207663a0822f56. The accumulated checksum of an entity is computed by accumulating the byte representation of entity checksums in the following order: (1) the metaChecksum of the current entity, (2) the accMetaChecksum of all child entities accumulated in order of the child's Entity.id. For an entity with no children, the accMetaChecksum is derived only from the metaChecksum but it is not equal to it because it is a checksum of that checksum and not a checksum of the same metadata directly.

objectType.name: DeletedArtifactDescriptionEvent
objectType.description: an event signifiying that a previously persisted ArtifactDescription was deleted; this event can be synchronized to propagate deletions; the Entity.id of the event is equal to the Entity.id of the deleted observation and this identifier is used when performing deletions

attribute.name: uri
attribute.description: The logical identifier of the ArtifactDescription: the ArtifactDescription.uri value; this is for informational purposes only

objectType.name: DeletedObservationEvent
objectType.description: an event signifiying that a previously persisted Observation was deleted; this event can be synchronized to propagate deletions; the Entity.id of the event is equal to the Entity.id of the deleted observation and this identifier is used when performing deletions

attribute.name: uri
attribute.description: The logical identifier of the Observation: the Observation.uri value; this is for informational purposes only

objectType.name: Observation
objectType.description: an observation is a single top-level entry in an astronomy data centre

attribute.name: collection
attribute.description: the name of the data collection this observation belongs to

attribute.name: uri
attribute.description: unique logical identifier for this observation (NEW in CAOM-2.5)

attribute.name: uriBucket
attribute.description: short string of hexadecimal digits generated from the uri; the value is the first three characters of the hexadecimal representation of SHA-1 of the UTF-8 encoded URI value

attribute.name: metaRelease
attribute.description: timestamp after which metadata for the observation instance is public

attribute.name: sequenceNumber
attribute.description: a collection-specific sequence number for observations; re-use or reset is collection specific

attribute.name: type
attribute.description: the type of observation (FITS OBSTYPE keyword); usually OBJECT for intent = science

attribute.name: intent
attribute.description: the intent of the original observer in acquiring this data

attribute.name: metaReadGroups
attribute.description: set of groups with read permission on observation metadata (new in 2.4)

composition.name: algorithm
composition.description: the algorithm or process that created this observation

composition.name: telescope
composition.description: the telescope or facility where this observation was created

composition.name: instrument
composition.description: the instrument or detector used to acquire the data

composition.name: environment
composition.description: the environmental conditions at the time of observation

composition.name: proposal
composition.description: the science proposal underwhich this observation was created

composition.name: target
composition.description: the intended target of the observation

composition.name: targetPosition
composition.description: the intended target position for this observation

composition.name: requirements
composition.description: the observational requirements specified by the observer or proposal

composition.name: planes
composition.description: the component planes belonging to this observation

objectType.name: SimpleObservation
objectType.description: an observation created directly by operating an instrument or process

objectType.name: DerivedObservation
objectType.description: an observation derived from one or more observations (name and intent changed in CAOM-2.4)

attribute.name: members

objectType.name: Plane
objectType.description: a component of an observation that describes one product of the observation

attribute.name: uri
attribute.description: unique logical identifier for this product; typically made by adding additional path component(s) to the Observation.uri (NEW in CAOM-2.5)

attribute.name: metaRelease
attribute.description: timestamp after which metadata for the plane is public; this metaRelease timestamp applies to all children of the plane and to artifacts with releaseType=meta

attribute.name: metaReadGroups
attribute.description: list of groups (of users) that are allowed to view the metadata of the plane; this is applicable when metaRelease is null or in the future (new in CAOM-2.4)

attribute.name: dataRelease
attribute.description: timestamp after which data for the plane is public; this dataRelease timestamp applies to all children of the plane and to artifacts with releaseType=data

attribute.name: dataReadGroups
attribute.description: list of groups (of users) that are allowed to access the data of the plane; this is applicable when dataRelease is null or in the future (new in CAOM-2.4)

attribute.name: calibrationLevel
attribute.description: standard classification of the degree to which the data is calibrated

attribute.name: dataProductType
attribute.description: standard classification of the type of data product; describes the logical data type for the main artifacts

composition.name: observable
composition.description: description of the sample (pixel) values; (new in CAOM-2.4) In previous versions the observable was assumed to be flux or intensity of EM radiation.

composition.name: quality
composition.description: flag indicating the quality of the data

composition.name: metrics
composition.description: collection of measured quantities that describe the content of the data

composition.name: position
composition.description: description of the position(s) included in the data

composition.name: energy
composition.description: descritpion of the energy(ies) included in the data

composition.name: time
composition.description: description of the time(s) included in the data

composition.name: polarization
composition.description: description of the polarization(s) included in the data

composition.name: custom
provenance
composition.description: description of the provenance of the data

composition.name: artifacts
composition.description: the component artifacts belonging to this plane

objectType.name: Artifact
objectType.description: a physical product (typically a file)

attribute.name: uri
attribute.description: an identifier that resolves to the storage location of the artifact

attribute.name: uriBucket
attribute.description: short string of hexadecimal digits generated from the uri; the value is the first three characters of the hexadecimal representation of SHA-1 of the UTF-8 encoded URI value

attribute.name: productType
attribute.description: the relationship of this Artifact to the parent Plane (DataLink semantics)

attribute.name: releaseType
attribute.description: field indicating how access permissions for this artifact are determined

attribute.name: contentType
attribute.description: label specifying the format of the resolved artifact; typically a MIME-type

attribute.name: contentLength
attribute.description: the size of the resolved artifact; typically file size in bytes

attribute.name: contentChecksum
contentRelease
attribute.description: timestamp after which content for the plane is public (new in CAOM-2.4); if set, this value overrides the permission implied by the releaseType and Plane release dates

attribute.name: contentReadGroups
attribute.description: list of groups (of users) that are allowed to access the content of this artifact; this is applicable when the effective release date is null or in the future (new in CAOM-2.4)

attribute.name: descriptionID
attribute.description: identifier for an ArtifactDescription entity (new in CAOM-2.5)

composition.name: parts
composition.description: the component parts of this artifact

objectType.name: ArtifactDescription
objectType.description: shared and referenceable description of an artitfact (NEW in CAOM-2.5)

attribute.name: uri
attribute.description: logical identifier for this description

attribute.name: description
attribute.description: description of an artifact

objectType.name: Part
objectType.description: format-specific name of this part; this is typically something like a FITS extension or a file within a container

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: the name of this part of the artifact; this is typically something like a FITS extension name or number or a filename

attribute.name: productType
attribute.description: the relationship of this Artifact to the parent Plane (DataLink semantics)

composition.name: chunks
composition.description: component chunks that belong to this part

objectType.name: Chunk
objectType.description: a quantitatively defined subsection of a data array; the part contains the whole array

attribute.name: productType
attribute.description: the relationship of this Artifact to the parent Plane (DataLink semantics)

attribute.name: naxis
attribute.description: number of axes in the data array; value must be in [1,7] since CAOM supports a maximum of seven axes; furthermore, if naxis has a value, the axis index values 1 to {naxis} must be assigned (to positionAxis1, positionAxis2, energyAxis, timeAxis, polarizationAxis, customAxis, and/or observableAxis) and each axis index value assigned to those fields must be unique; axis index values above {naxis} may be assigned in order to preserve the ordering of metadata-only WCS (see FITS-WCS WCSAXES defintion for an example of how this could originate and be used)

attribute.name: positionAxis1
attribute.description: index of the first position axis; if set: positionAxis2 and position must also have values

attribute.name: positionAxis2
attribute.description: index of the second position axis; if set: positionAxis1 and position must also have values

attribute.name: energyAxis
attribute.description: index of the energy axis; if set: energy must have a value

attribute.name: timeAxis
attribute.description: index of the time axis; if set: time must have a value

attribute.name: polarizationAxis
attribute.description: index of the polarization axis; if set: polarization must have a value

attribute.name: customAxis
attribute.description: index of the custom axis; if set: custom must have a value

attribute.name: observableAxis
attribute.description: index of the observable axis; if set: observable must have a value

composition.name: position
composition.description: spatial WCS description of the data array or subsection thereof; if positionAxis1 and positionAxis2 indices are null or have values above {naxis}, then the spatial WCS is metadata only (usually the degenerate case of one spatial pixel)

composition.name: energy
composition.description: spectral WCS description of the data array or subsection thereof; if energyAxis index is null or has a value above {naxis}, then the spectral WCS is metadata only (usually the degenerate case of one spectral pixel)

composition.name: time
composition.description: temporal WCS description of the data array or subsection thereof; if timeAxis index is null or has a value above {naxis}, then the time WCS is metadata only (usually the degenerate case of one time pixel for the whole data array)

composition.name: polarization
composition.description: polarization WCS description of the data array or subsection thereof; if polarizationAxis index is null or has a value above {naxis}, then the polarization WCS is metadata only (usually the degenerate case of one polarization pixel)

composition.name: custom
composition.description: custom WCS description of the data array or subsection thereof; if customAxis index is null or has a value above {naxis}, then the custom WCS is metadata only (usually the degenerate case of one custom pixel)

composition.name: observable
composition.description: observable description of the data array or subsection thereof; if observableAxis index is null or has a value above {naxis}, then the observable axis is metadata only (usually the degenerate case of one observable for the whole data array)

objectType.name: Algorithm
objectType.description: the algorithm that was responsible for creating the observation; for a DerivedObservation this is the algorithm that defines the intended set of members to include

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: common name of the algorithm; the value 'exposure' is reserved for use in SimpleObservation; TBD: publish a list of acceptable values as a machine-readable vocabulary?

objectType.name: Telescope
objectType.description: the telescope used to acquire the data for an observation

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: common name of the telescope; TBD: reference to a standard list of names?

attribute.name: geoLocationX
attribute.description: x-coordinate of the geocentric location of the telescope at the time of observation (see FITS WCS Paper III)

attribute.name: geoLocationY
attribute.description: y-coordinate of the geocentric location of the telescope at the time of observation (see FITS WCS Paper III)

attribute.name: geoLocationZ
attribute.description: z-coordinate of the geocentric location of the telescope at the time of observation (see FITS WCS Paper III)

attribute.name: keywords
attribute.description: additional keywords that describe the telescope or telscope configuration at the time of observation; keywords cannot contain the pipe (|) character - it is reserved for use in persistence systems (e.g. to store all keywords in a single column in a table)

attribute.name: trackingMode
attribute.description: term from the (currently non-existent) IVOA Tracking vocabulary used to indicate how the telescope moves during data acquisition

objectType.name: Instrument
objectType.description: the instrument used to acquire or create the observation; this could be used for both physical instruments that acquire data or software that generates it (e.g. simulated data)

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: common name for the instrument

attribute.name: keywords
attribute.description: additional keywords that describe the instrument or instrument configuration at the time of observation; keywords cannot contain the pipe (|) character - it is reserved for use in persistence systems (e.g. to store all keywords in a single column in a table)

objectType.name: Environment
objectType.description: collection of measured quantities that characterise the environment at the time of observation

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: typical atmospheric distortion (full-width-half-max of a point source)

attribute.name: humidity
attribute.description: fractional relative humidity [0,1]

attribute.name: elevation
attribute.description: angular elevation above horizon [0,90]

attribute.name: tau
attribute.description: the opacity of the atmosphere [0,1]

attribute.name: wavelengthTau
attribute.description: wavelength at which opacity was measured

attribute.name: ambientTemp
attribute.description: ambient temperature at the telescope

attribute.name: photometric
attribute.description: indicator that flux and/or color calibration is stable

objectType.name: Proposal
objectType.description: description of the science proposal or programme that initiated the observation

attribute.name: proposalID
attribute.description: collection-specific identifier for the proposal

attribute.name: pi
attribute.description: proper name of the principal investigator

attribute.name: project
attribute.description: common name of the project this proposal belongs to; typically used for larger or long-running projects that include mutliple proposals

attribute.name: title
attribute.description: title of the proposal

attribute.name: keywords
reference
attribute.description: identifier for external resource with proposal details

objectType.name: Target
objectType.description: the target of an observation

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: proper name of the target

attribute.name: targetID
type
attribute.description: type of target; typically used to figure out what the target name means and where to look for additional information about it

attribute.name: redshift
attribute.description: cosmological redshift of the target

attribute.name: standard
attribute.description: indicates that the target is typically used as a standard (astrometric, photometric, etc)

attribute.name: moving
attribute.description: indicates that the target is a moving object; used for solar system objects but not high proper motion stars

attribute.name: keywords

objectType.name: TargetPosition
objectType.description: the intended position of the observation (not the position of the intended or actual target)

attribute.name: coordsys
attribute.description: the coordinate system of the coordinates

attribute.name: equinox
attribute.description: the equinox of the coordinates

composition.name: coordinates
composition.description: the coordinates

objectType.name: Requirements
objectType.description: the observational requirements specified by the proposal

attribute.name: flag
attribute.description: flag indicating degree to which requirements were satisfied by the observation

objectType.name: Provenance
objectType.description: description of how this data was produced

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: collection-specific common name of the process

attribute.name: reference
attribute.description: identifier for external resource with proposal details

attribute.name: version
attribute.description: version of the software or process that produced the data

attribute.name: project
attribute.description: name of the project that produced the data; data produced in a uniform way are typically labelled with the same project name

attribute.name: producer
attribute.description: common name of the entity (person, institute, etc) responsible for producing the data

attribute.name: runID
attribute.description: collection-specific identifier for the processing instance that produced the data; this identifier can typcially be traced in log files or logging systems

attribute.name: lastExecuted
attribute.description: timestamp describing when this process last ran and produced data

attribute.name: keywords
attribute.description: additional keywords that describe the processing; this may include both general descriptive words and those specific to this particular execution of the processing; keywords cannot contain the pipe (|) character - it is reserved for use in persistence systems (e.g. to store all keywords in a single column in a table)

attribute.name: inputs
attribute.description: local identifier for input planes; these are the actual inputs that went into the product

objectType.name: Observable
objectType.description: description of the sample (pixel) values

attribute.name: ucd
attribute.description: Unified Content Descriptor (UCD) that says what kind of quantity is stored

attribute.name: calibration
attribute.description: term describing the calibration of the observable values

objectType.name: DataQuality
objectType.description: description of the data quality

attribute.name: flag
attribute.description: flag indicating the data quality

objectType.name: Metrics
objectType.description: collection of measured quantities that describe the content of the data

attribute.name: sourceNumberDensity
attribute.description: number of sources detected per unit area

attribute.name: background
attribute.description: background level

attribute.name: backgroundStddev
attribute.description: standard deviation in the background level

attribute.name: fluxDensityLimit
attribute.description: flux density with a signal:noise ratio of 10

attribute.name: magLimit
attribute.description: magnitude with a signal:noise ratio of 10

attribute.name: sampleSNR
attribute.description: signal:noise ratio for a representative subset of samples (new in CAOM-2.4)

objectType.name: Position
objectType.description: description of the position coverage and sampling of the data

composition.name: bounds
composition.description: spatial boundary that includes the data (cardinality changed in CAOM-2.5)

composition.name: samples
composition.description: detailed sub-samples of the bounds (refactored in CAOM-2.5)

composition.name: minBounds
composition.description: minimum spatial boundary that includes the data; this value is smaller than the bounds (maximum) when the field-of-view varies because it is dependent on another axis (usually energy) (new in CAOM-2.5)

attribute.name: dimension
attribute.description: number of separate measurements (pixels) along each axis

attribute.name: maxAngularScale
attribute.description: maximum size of spatial structure (signal) that can be recovered or seen in the data (new in CAOM-2.5)

attribute.name: resolution
attribute.description: mean spatial resolution (full-width-half-max) per pixel

attribute.name: resolutionBounds
attribute.description: range of resolution within the bounds

attribute.name: sampleSize
attribute.description: median pixel size

attribute.name: calibration
attribute.description: term describing the calibration of the position axis values new in CAOM-2.5)

objectType.name: Energy
objectType.description: description of the energy coverage and sampling of the data

attribute.name: bounds
attribute.description: simple outer bounds of energy coverage of the data (cardinality changed in CAOM-2.5)

composition.name: samples
composition.description: detailed energy coverage of the data (refactored in CAOM-2.5)

attribute.name: energyBands
attribute.description: standard name of the energy regime(s) included in the data (attribute name and cardinality changed in CAOM-2.4)

attribute.name: dimension
attribute.description: number of measurements (pixels) on the energy axis

attribute.name: resolvingPower
attribute.description: mean spectral resolving power per pixel (relative resolution)

attribute.name: resolvingPowerBounds
attribute.description: range of resolving power within the bounds (relative resolution)

attribute.name: resolution
attribute.description: mean absolute spectral resolution per pixel (new in CAOM-2.5)

attribute.name: resolutionBounds
attribute.description: range of absolute spectral resolution within the bounds (new in CAOM-2.5)

attribute.name: sampleSize
attribute.description: mean pixel size

attribute.name: bandpassName
attribute.description: telescope- and instrument-specific name for the energy band(s) included; multiple bands may be included if energies from all specified bands are included in the data (in the sense of union)

attribute.name: transition
attribute.description: target energy transition for this data

attribute.name: restwav
attribute.description: rest energy of the target energy transition (name changed in CAOM-2.5)

attribute.name: calibration
attribute.description: term describing the calibration of the energy axis values (new in CAOM-2.5)

objectType.name: Time
objectType.description: description of the time coverage and sampling of the data

attribute.name: bounds
attribute.description: time bounds that include the data (cardinality changed in CAOM-2.5)

composition.name: samples
composition.description: detailed time coverage that include the data (refactored in CAOM-2.5)

attribute.name: calibration
attribute.description: term describing the calibration of the time axis values

attribute.name: dimension
attribute.description: number of discrete samples (pixels) on the time axis

attribute.name: resolution
attribute.description: median temporal resolution per pixel

attribute.name: resolutionBounds
attribute.description: range of resolution within the bounds

attribute.name: sampleSize
attribute.description: median pixel size

attribute.name: exposure
attribute.description: mean exposure time per pixel

attribute.name: exposureBounds
attribute.description: range of exposure within the bounds

objectType.name: Polarization
objectType.description: description of polarization measurements included in the data

attribute.name: states
attribute.description: standard polarization states included (cardinality changed in CAOM-2.5)

attribute.name: dimension
attribute.description: number of polarization states included

objectType.name: CustomAxis
objectType.description: description of a custom coordinate axis (new in CAOM-2.4)

attribute.name: ctype
attribute.description: coordinate type code

attribute.name: bounds
attribute.description: custom coordinate coverage (cardinality changed in CAOM-2.5)

composition.name: samples
composition.description: detailed custom coordinate coverage (refactored in CAOM-2.5)

attribute.name: dimension
attribute.description: number of discrete samples (pixels) along custom axis

objectType.name: Visibility
objectType.description: description of a UV-plane for interferometry data (new in CAOM-2.5)

attribute.name: distance
attribute.description: range of distances in the UV plane

attribute.name: distributionEccentricity
attribute.description: eccentricity of the distribtuion of ??? in [0,1]

attribute.name: distributionFill
attribute.description: fill-factor of the distribtuion of ??? in [0,1]

dataType.name: Interval
dataType.description: a set of numeric values defined by a lower and upper bound (bounds included: [a,b])

objectType.name: Point
objectType.description: location on the sky

objectType.name: Circle
objectType.description: a circular region on the sky

objectType.name: MultiShape
objectType.description: multiple simple shapess describing disconnected regions as a single value

objectType.name: Polygon
objectType.description: a simple polygon region on the sky defined a sequence of points connected by great-circle segments

objectType.name: IntervalM
objectType.description: an interval that can appear in a composition

dataType.name: Axis
dataType.description: one-dimensional coordinate axis description

dataType.name: Dimension2D
dataType.description: dimension (number of pixels) for a two-dimensional axis

dataType.name: RefCoord
dataType.description: a reference coordinate with a pixel and cooresponding world coordinate value

dataType.name: CoordError
dataType.description: coordinate error from FITS WCS

dataType.name: Slice
dataType.description: a one-dimensional subset of a two-dimensional array

attribute.name: axis
attribute.description: description of the values within a the slice

attribute.name: bin
attribute.description: a constant-pixel value in the two-dimensional array that specifies the pixels in the slice

dataType.name: Coord2D
dataType.description: a two-dimensional (pair) of reference coordinates

dataType.name: CoordRange1D
dataType.description: a one-dimensional range of reference coordinates

dataType.name: CoordFunction1D
dataType.description: a one-dimensional (linear) WCS coordinate transformation function

attribute.name: dimension
attribute.description: number of pixels along the axis

attribute.name: refCoord
attribute.description: the reference pixel and world coordinate values

attribute.name: delta
attribute.description: delta in world coordinate value (size of one pixel)

dataType.name: CoordRange2D
dataType.description: a two-dimensional range of reference coordinates; this can be used to specify an axis-aligned bounding box in pixel and world coordinates

attribute.name: start
attribute.description: the two-dimensional reference coordinates with minimum longitude and latitude

attribute.name: end
attribute.description: the two-dimensional reference coordinates with maximum longitude and latitude

dataType.name: CoordFunction2D
dataType.description: a two-dimensional (linear) WCS coordinate transformation function; this can be used to compute the world coordinates of every pixel

attribute.name: dimension
attribute.description: number of pixels along each axis of the two-dimensional space (FITS: NAXISi)

attribute.name: refCoord
attribute.description: two-dimensional reference pixel and world coordinate values (FITS: CRPIXi, CRVALi)

attribute.name: cd11
attribute.description: two-dimensional scale and rotation (CD) matrix (FITS: CD1_1)

attribute.name: cd12
attribute.description: two-dimensional scale and rotation (CD) matrix (FITS: CD1_2)

attribute.name: cd21
attribute.description: two-dimensional scale and rotation (CD) matrix (FITS: CD2_1)

attribute.name: cd22
attribute.description: two-dimensional scale and rotation (CD) matrix (FITS: CD2_2)

objectType.name: Coord2DM
objectType.description: a two-dimensional (pair) of reference coordinates

objectType.name: CoordRange1DM
objectType.description: a one-dimensional range of reference coordinates

objectType.name: CoordBounds1D
objectType.description: a one-dimensional sequence of reference coordinate ranges

objectType.name: CoordAxis1D
objectType.description: a one-dimensional coordinate axis: quantity, values, errors; it is usually only necessary to specify one of the range, bounds, or function as they describe the world and pixel coordinate coverage at different levels of detail and the less detailed description is redundant (exception: when the range or bounds and function are both specified, the range/bounds is a subset of the pixels described by the function and denotes the valid pixels

attribute.name: axis
attribute.description: description of the quantity

attribute.name: error
attribute.description: errors

attribute.name: range
attribute.description: pixel and world coordinate values covered by this axis (min,max)

composition.name: bounds
composition.description: pixel and world coordinate values covered by this axis (min,max of tiles)

attribute.name: function
attribute.description: pixel and world coordinate values covered by this axis (coordinates of every pixel)

objectType.name: CoordBounds2D
objectType.description: a two-dimensional region in pixel and world coordinates; this can be used to specify a simple polygon boundary in pixel and world coordinates

composition.name: vertices
composition.description: the vertices of the polygon with implicit segment from the last vertex back to the first

objectType.name: CoordAxis2D
objectType.description: a two-dimensional coordinate axis pair: quantity, values, errors; it is usually only necessary to specify one of the range, bounds, or function as they describe the world and pixel coordinate coverage at different levels of detail and the less detailed description is redundant (exception: when the range or bounds and function are both specified, the range/bounds is a subset of the pixels described by the function and denotes the valid pixels

attribute.name: axis1
attribute.description: first axis of the spatial coordinate system; usually longitude

attribute.name: axis2
attribute.description: second axis of the spatial coordinate system; usually latitude

attribute.name: error1
attribute.description: position errors on the first axis

attribute.name: error2
attribute.description: position errors on the second axis

attribute.name: range
attribute.description: pixel and world coordinate values covered by this axis (min,max)

composition.name: bounds
composition.description: pixel and world coordinate values covered by this axis (boundary)

attribute.name: function
attribute.description: pixel and world coordinate values covered by this axis (coordinates of every pixel

objectType.name: SpatialWCS
objectType.description: World Coordinate System (WCS) metadata for the position axes

composition.name: axis
composition.description: description of the two-dimensional position axes

attribute.name: coordsys
attribute.description: name of the coordinate system

attribute.name: equinox
attribute.description: equinox of the coordinate system

attribute.name: resolution
attribute.description: effective resolution of the data (FWHM of a point source); this is usually the value measured at the time of data acquisition

composition.name: axis
composition.description: description of the one-dimensional energy axis

attribute.name: specsys
attribute.description: reference frame for the spectral coordinate

attribute.name: ssysobs
attribute.description: reference frame that is constant over the range of the non-spectral world coordinates

attribute.name: ssyssrc
attribute.description: reference frame for the velocity of the source (zsource)

attribute.name: restfrq
attribute.description: rest frequency of the spectral feature of interest

attribute.name: restwav
attribute.description: rest wavelength of the spectral feature of interest

attribute.name: velosys
attribute.description: correction for the observatory's motion with respect to the barycenter

attribute.name: zsource
attribute.description: redshift of the source (relative to ssyssrc)

attribute.name: velang
attribute.description: angle of true velocity from tangent to line of sight

attribute.name: bandpassName
attribute.description: telescope- or instrument-specific name for the energy band covered by the data; this is usually a filter name

attribute.name: transition
attribute.description: description of the energy transition observed

attribute.name: resolvingPower
attribute.description: ratio of wavelength to resolution (lambda/delta-lambda)

objectType.name: TemporalWCS
objectType.description: one-dimensional pixel and world coordinates describing the time axis

composition.name: axis
composition.description: description of the time axis

attribute.name: timesys
attribute.description: time scale for the time coordinates

attribute.name: trefpos
attribute.description: reference position for the time coordinates

attribute.name: mjdref
attribute.description: base time offset; time coordinate values are relative to this

attribute.name: exposure
attribute.description: duration in time that the instrument was collecting data

attribute.name: resolution
attribute.description: smallest separation in time that can be distinguished

objectType.name: PolarizationWCS
objectType.description: one-dimensional pixel and world coordinates describing the polarization states

composition.name: axis
composition.description: description of the polarization axis

objectType.name: CustomWCS
objectType.description: one-dimensional pixel and world coordinates describing a non-standard (custom) coordinate axis

composition.name: axis
composition.description: description of the custom axis

objectType.name: ObservableAxis
objectType.description: an axis in the data (array) that varies by observable rather than coordinate; this axis is used when the data array containts values with different meaning in different subsets of the array (e.g. a row of pixels with wavelength values and a second row with flux values)

attribute.name: dependent
attribute.description: the part of the array containing the observable values

attribute.name: independent
attribute.description: the part of the array containing coordinate values
